name: ServiceNow Dark by TeamUltra
description:
This style is for the ServiceNow platform and will re-style the user interface with a dark theme that matches the look used from Geneva onwards.

As ServiceNow has become a vast platform there is no way that this can be tested for all use-cases, so please let me know if there is a specific area I'm missing and I'll see what I can do.
additional_info:
08/11/2016 SN Debug output has embedded font colours, so made their background lighter
20/10/2016 Updated to colour the script editor

Just made a few minor updates (17/10/2016) to get the headers of forms and attachments displayed a bit clearer. At some point I'll sort out the colours of the script editor.

Please give comments on areas that have been missed or end up unreadable.

Testing has been performed on ServiceNow versions Fuji, Geneva and Helsinki.

I've been making minor changes to this, so you may want to update from time to time, there are a few more areas to cover yet (e.g. the script editor).

discussions.name: How to change colour of group link/ headers
body text color is too dark
